stories.text:
tl;dr What can happen if an American journalist flies to Russia and tries to interview Putin?

Lex recently interviewed Stephen Kotkin (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2a7CDKqWcZ0) who has really opinions on the war between Russian Ukraine.

For years now, Lex has been mentioning how he wants to fly to Russia and interview Putin, but recent political events, along with this interview, obviously increase that risk.

Lex continues to mention that he plans to fly to Russia. He has interviewed Vitalik Buterin, who met Putin back in 2017, a couple of times so I think it's a fair assumption that he has a way to get connected to Putin's team.

In my personal opinion, Lex has been doing a great job staying unbiased in his interviews, but if he tries to meet with Putin, is it too far fetched to imagine a Navalny type situation, except with an American citizen?
stories.title: Could Lex Fridman going to Russia spark a war?
